mkv11:2: katamat karma alpabhogasaṁvartanīyam. ucyate. adattādānam. adattādānasamādāpanam. cauryavarṇavāditā. tadabhyanumodanam. mātāpitror vṛttyupacchedaḥ. tathānyeṣāṁ vyādhitabālavṛddhakṛpaṇānāṁ vṛttyupacchedaḥ. parasya lābhenātuṣṭiḥ. paralābhāntarāyakriyā durbhikṣābhinandanaṁ ca. idaṁ karma alpabhogasaṁvartanīyam.
